::Magmatron::

    Magmatron heard the call on his comm. Since he was already near Shredder, 
he decided to greet him in person.
    "Greetings Shredder. I am Magmatron." He started. "I understand you made 
Bazooka a Predacon. And from what he tells me you are a great fighter, and 
seeing this arial battle I know he is right. If you will follow me we can 
talk where it is safer. But first you must attach this to you, my autoguns 
will not see you as a threat with this on. Your comrade may join us to if he 
wishes." Magmatron said pointing to Mantella.
